name: Knallersuche
description:
Can you find all bombs?

Knallersuche is like a territorial puzzle inspired by the legendary Minesweeper. Uncover every single field but keep watching out for the hidden bombs! If you hit one, your whole field will blow up and the game is over.

This game was made to be the perfect waste of time.

Coming soon

Knallersuche will regularly be updated and occassionally enhanced by new game modes.
